name: GoofySounds
0:
”Alexa, open goofy sounds”
”Alexa, start goofy sounds”
”Alexa, launch goofy sounds”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: goofy sounds
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Goofy Sounds lets you reproduce the funniest and goofiest audio tracks that will make you laugh! Hear the goofiest sounds and have fun with your friends!
We update our skills frequently with new and fun updates!

To add this skill on your Alexa Routines, please do the following:

Enable this Alexa skill.
On Alexa app, navigate to Routines.
Click + to add a new routine.
Click + for "When this happens" and choose one.
Click + for "Add action" and choose "Skills".
Choose "Your Skills".
Select this skill.
Click Next.
Choose Device to perform the routine to.
Click Save.

Stay updated on Smart Skills also on Instagram! 
Smart Skills - (@smartskills.it)
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
